item.title: How do i make an npc say player name
item.dc:creator: @server_dude server dude
item.description:
@server_dude wrote:

wrong section dude but…

in or under the teleport code add this

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "playerName + " has just teled to #######";

item.title: How do i make an npc say player name
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

open up npchandler.java
search for “moo” and after the } add this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXTHERE!"; }replace the IDHERE into the NPC id and the TEXTHERE what de NPC does say

Read full topic
